name: Tenka Touitsu
overview: Tenka Touitsu is a strategy game that takes place in these shogunates: 1 - Tokugawa Ieyasu (1543-1616) 2. Tokugawa Hidetada (1579-1632) the player choose where to begin the game: (1546, 1582 & 1599) and got a lot of different menus (all in japanese languages that makes the game really complicated) that will allow the player to move units and other things in each turn, etc.
